titleStmt.title: The debellacyon of Salem and Bizance
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.
Saint German, Christopher, 1460?-1540. Salem and Bizance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Prynted by w. Rastell in Fletestrete in saynte Bridys chyrch yarde,

notesStmt.note: The author's name, Sir Thomas More, appears at the beginning of the preface.
A partial reprinting of and a reply to: Saint German, Christopher. Salem and Bizance.
"The secu[n]d part, the. vx. chapyter" (caption title) has separate register and foliation.
Y8 (blank) is replaced by a two-leaf address by the author signed [rum]² . Variant: lacking these leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Fletestrete in saynte Bridys chyrch yarde
